title: I dont have the 10 yr avatar
body: I got the Kayle skin, but not the Avatar.

replies.body: No worries friend, you'll get everything in time.  Per our current [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-), it'll be a bit for everyone to receive a gift since there's so many eligible players.  Hang tight!
The gifts are rolling out one by one and they should all arrive on your account by 9/23.
